question_text: Which of the following challenges can arise during individual key repair on a laptop? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Irreversible damage to the ribbon cable
Loss of tactile response due to misalignment
correct_answer: Loss of tactile response due to misalignment
explanation: Individual key repair is prone to mechanical issues like hinge breakage, fitment problems, and misaligned parts. Ribbon cable or driver issues are not typically involved.
